case.title: HANDSOME SUCCESSFUL SEEKS MUCH YOUNGER BEAUTIFUL ASIAN - 52 (Suffolk, Long Island)
case.text: I AM SEEKING A BEAUTIFUL THIN YOUNGER ASIAN FEMALE UNDER 39 WHO IS CARING, AFFECTIONATE, FOR FUN AND EXCITING TIMES LEADING TO A SERIOUS RELATIONSHIP. IF THIS SOUNDS LIKE YOU THEN RESPOND WITH A PIC, AGE, AND LOCATION, AND WRITE (ASIAN) IN THE HEADLINE SO I DO NOT DELETE IT IN MY SPAM FOLDER. PREFER LONG ISLAND....SERIOUS ONLY.
